content: pdf digital download crochet pattern cozy up in this modern and chic ear warmer for fall as the weather starts to get cool an ear warmer is the perfect accessory it looks great styled with a top knot bun or equally stunning worn with your hair down the pattern is worked in herringbone single_crochet so the fabric comes out thick and bulky video tutorial on youtube included skill level easy written in standard american terms **wander yarn from furls crochet** https //shrsl com/36qvc use code mjs15 for 15% off worsted weight yarn #4 100% acrylic 120 yds/100g 1 skein needed 60 90 108 yards **us i/9 5 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge** https //shrsl com/36nzt use code mjs15 for 15% off scissors tapestry needle faux leather tag head size easily adjustable to any size 18 5 20 5 22 8 sts and 6 25 row equal to 2 with 5 5mm crochet hook in hbsc video link https //youtu be/kfadpkan4hk you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online i would love you to reference me as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items
